title: Teaching Methods Practical Competency Enhancement: Customized Instructional Design for Strengthening Household Disaster Preparedness Behaviors

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can advance at least one stage in the disaster preparedness action phases (pre-awareness → planning → implementation) within three months.
Learners can create and implement a customized disaster preparedness plan tailored to their job-specific characteristics.
Learners can explain at least three effective communication protocols with household members during a disaster.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
